synopsis.text:
Music and animation unite to tell the story of a young girl's journey through adolescence in this captivating short film, set to the tune of Soutasei Riron's 'Miss Parallel World'. Directed by Wataru Uekusa, the narrative follows our protagonist from her elementary school days to the complexities of high school life. As she matures, her world expands and her thoughts deepen, revealing a rich inner life filled with daydreams and introspection.

The film takes a unique approach to visualizing her inner world, using a blend of humor and surrealism. As the young girl wanders through a mysterious town, she encounters various monsters that represent her thoughts and feelings. These creatures, along with her daydreams, are brought to life on a monitor screen, offering viewers a glimpse into her private world.

The film's aesthetic is characterized by its delicate lines, light shades, and strong sense of design, creating a unique and transparent worldview. The up-tempo music adds an energetic layer to the narrative, complementing the girl's journey through adolescence. This captivating blend of music, animation, and storytelling promises to offer viewers an engaging and thought-provoking experience.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
